channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Hong Kong Polytechnic University on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Multimodal LLMs Can Reason about Aesthetics in Zero-Shot
item.description: Multimodal LLMs can now evaluate art aesthetics with human-level accuracy using a novel dataset (MM-StyleBench) and prompt method (ArtCoT), significantly improving AI alignment in artistic evaluation.

item.title: MolReFlect: Towards In-Context Fine-grained Alignments between Molecules and Texts
item.description: MolReFlect achieves state-of-the-art molecule-text alignment by using a teacher-student LLM framework that generates fine-grained alignments, improving accuracy and explainability.
